message.easybuild.guide.line1: - Press 'P' to toggle the client auto-build using the configured default schematic.
message.easybuild.guide.line2: - Look at a chest and press 'O' to register it as a material source; press 'L' to remove it again.
message.easybuild.guide.line3: - Watch the chat for material check and build job feedback while blocks are being placed.
message.easybuild.guide.line4: - Try disconnecting/reconnecting; active jobs clean up on logout and stalled jobs timeout automatically.
message.easybuild.guide.line5: - Review the server log for detailed EasyBuild job lifecycle entries when testing complex schematics.
